Actions.Name: Run query and list results
Actions.Description: Runs the query and returns the result as a set of rows which can be iterated over in the following connectors.

Actions.Name: Run control show command and list results
Actions.Description: Runs the show control command and returns the result as a set of rows which can be iterated over in the following connectors.

Actions.Name: Run async control command and wait until it is completed
Actions.Description: Runs control command in async mode and returns its ID, state and status on completion. Command can run for maximum 1 hour.

Actions.Name: Run control command and visualize results
Actions.Description: Returns the Kusto control command result as a chart of your choice.

Actions.Name: Run query and visualize results
Actions.Description: Returns the Kusto query result as a chart of your choice.
